scripts.pod-install: cd ios; bundle exec pod install;cd ..
scripts.clean:rn: watchman watch-del-all; rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-native-packager-cache-*; rm -rf $TMPDIR/metro-cache; rm -rf $TMPDIR/haste-map-react-native-packager-*
scripts.clean:yarn: rm -rf node_modules/; yarn cache clean; yarn install
scripts.clean:system: rm -rf ~/.cocoapods; rm -rf /Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData; rm -rf ~/.gradle/; rm -rf $(getconf DARWIN_USER_CACHE_DIR)/org.llvm.clang/ModuleCache; rm -rf $(getconf DARWIN_USER_CACHE_DIR)/org.llvm.clang.$(whoami)/ModuleCache; rm -fr ~/Library/Caches/com.apple.dt.Xcode/
scripts.clean:ios: rm -rf ios/build; pod cache clean --all; rm -rf ios/Pods; cd ios; xcodebuild -alltargets clean; cd ..
scripts.clean: yarn run clean:rn; yarn run clean:yarn; yarn run clean:android; yarn run clean:ios; yarn run pod-install
scripts.deep-clean: yarn run clean:system; yarn run clean
scripts.deploy:android:development:release: cd android && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env development.release; cd ..
scripts.deploy:android:production:release: cd android && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env production.release; cd ..
scripts.deploy:ios:development:release: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env development.release; cd ..
scripts.deploy:ios:production:release: cd ios && bundle exec fastlane deploy --env production.release; cd ..
